svg.text: PK = Primary Key, FK = Foreign Key, TEXT = SQLite TEXT

text.font-family: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: Arrows point from parent to child. Cardinalities: 1, *, 0..1
